text: Daniel Grahame Bartlett (born 13 October 2000) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for League One club Coventry City. ==Career== Bartlett started his career in the youth system at Southampton before making a move to Coventry City prior to the 2019–20 season. Bartlett made his debut in an EFL Trophy game against Walsall. Not long into his Coventry City career he was ruled out with a serious knee injury suffered in an under-23s game. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center" |+Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|FA Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1"|Coventry City |2019–20 |League One |0||0||0||0||0||0||1Appearance in the EFL Trophy||0||1||0 |- !colspan="3" | Career totals !0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Dan Bartlett player profile at ccfc.co.uk * * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Poole Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Coventry City F.C. players
